context.description: Are you doing Client-side implementation or Server-side implementation? NOTE: If you are implementing on the Server-side, then you must know the IP address and Port number of the server.
If you know both IP address and Port number of the server, select Yes.
Enter both IP address and Port number of the server. Please ensure that you have entered them correctly.
Choose a Multi-Party Computation scenario to be implemented. Read the description of Euclidean distance and Millionaire's Comparison in the 'Note' section.
There are five levels of security, from low to high. Choose one!
